name: Pike Push Ups
how_to_perform:
1. Start in a plank position with your hands shoulder-width apart and engage your core by drawing your belly button towards your spine.
2. Bend your elbows and lower your body until your upper arms are parallel to the ground, then lift your hindering leg into a pike position while keeping your torso stable.
3. In this piked position, push upwards from the ground with the arm closest to your body, extending it fully while keeping your shoulder blades together.
4. Lower back down without touching your chest or belly on the ground, maintaining proper form and muscle engagement throughout the movement.
5. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Pike push-ups are an exercise that combines strength training with stretching in a plank position
